reviewText: I've seen it as a child. So it was a must buy

I watched this epsiode on TV and just had to have it.
Some of the humour is beyond a 5 year old though
but hey, I'm 50!

This is a perfect gift for any person who likes fairly oddparents!

I got as a gift from my sister when she went to USA, and I loved it a lot...The long episode Abra-Catastrophe is very fun and entertaining, and as it's so long, lots of things happen, so you can watch it over and over and over again and you never get sick of it. And for those times when you don't want to see this long episode, you can watch the Timmy's Top Wishes DVD, it has 7 13-mins episodes, and the ones they selected to include here are very good, my favorite episodes are "Where's Wanda", "Boys In The Band" and "Pipe Down" (one of the 2 bonus episodes).
this movie is the best movie i've seen in a long time and it was something i would share with any fop fans
